title: What to do when after getting scammed?
selftext:
Someone I know got scammed from a telegram group. He wasted >20 lacs by transferring to several bank accounts.

This scam is similar to https://www.indiatoday.in/technology/news/story/man-joins-telegram-group-to-start-part-time-job-but-ends-up-losing-rs-31-lakh-from-bank-account-2410920-2023-07-24

I asked him to do and FIR or report online on cyber crime, but he is afraid his parents might get to know. Is there any way to get back the money? Or it's a lost cause?
comments:
Police only .. recent case was published in newspaper where similar happened and they were able to catch the perpetrators, not all. 

Despite them transferring money to multiple bank accounts in and around China, Europe and others, decent/some money was able to be recovered.

Check Google about article .. simply put , FIR !

I once got a WhatsApp msg from such a scammer. First thing I did was Google "YouTube video like scam". Then I saw an article where a guy was duped 24 lakh. I took screenshot of the conversation and emailed it to the police.
